# load packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(nhdplusTools)
library(USAboundaries)
```


# subset Limnosat lakes > 10 ha for Georgia and Texas
```{r, eval = F, warning = F}
## Read in the geospatial data
# Lakes
lakes <- st_read('Data/HydroLakes_DP.shp') %>%
  st_centroid() %>%
  filter(type == 'dp') # Grab only deepest point data

#Get Texas and Georgia outlines
tx_ga <- us_states() %>%
  filter(state_abbr %in% c('TX', 'GA')) %>%
  st_transform(st_crs(lakes))

# With elevation data
tx_ga_lakes <- lakes[tx_ga,] 


write.csv(tx_ga_lakes, "Data/tx_ga_lakes.csv")


#LimnoSat color information
ls_tx_ga <- read_csv('srCorrected_us_hydrolakes_dp_20200628.csv') %>%
  filter(Hylak_id %in% tx_ga_lakes$Hylak_id) %>%
  inner_join(tx_ga_lakes %>% 
               as.data.frame(.) %>%
               select(-geometry) %>%
               select(Hylak_id,elevation))

save(ls_tx_ga, tx_ga_lakes, fui.lookup, fui.colors, file = 'data/ls_elev.RData')
```
